keel.Algorithms.Rule_Learning.Ripper

Class Mask

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Rule_Learning.Ripper.Mask

  • public class Mask
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mask(int size)
      Constructs a Mask of a given length.
      Mask(int size, boolean initial)
      Constructs a Mask of a given length The cursor is set atBegin (that's a non valid position and it will be necessary a next() to reach the first active position).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mask and(Mask m)
      Returns the mask that it's the outcome of the bolean operation 'and' between this and a given mask.
      void change(int i)
      Changes the value of a given position (if it was activated, it is now deactivated and vicecersa).

      Returns a complementary mask of this mask (the activated entries of this mask are deactivated and viceversa).

      Returns a copy of this Mask

      Sets the states (activated or deactivated) of a given position.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mask

        public Mask(int size)
        Constructs a Mask of a given length. By default, it actives all entries. The cursor is set atBegin (that's a non valid position and it will be necessary a next() to reach the first active position).
        Parameters:
        size - int the Mask's length

      • Mask

        public Mask(int size,
            boolean initial)
        Constructs a Mask of a given length The cursor is set atBegin (that's a non valid position and it will be necessary a next() to reach the first active position).
        Parameters:
        size - int the Mask's length
        initial - boolean initial value of the all entries

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public Mask copy()
        Returns a copy of this Mask
        Returns:
        a copy of this Mask

      • copyTo

        public void copyTo(Mask replicate)
        Copies this Mask into another Mask
        Parameters:
        replicate - Mask a future copy of this Mask

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive(int i)
        Returns wether a given entry is active or not
        Parameters:
        i - int the index of the entry
        Returns:
        true if a given entry is active

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Deactivates the entry pointed by the cursor

      • change

        public void change(int i)
        Changes the value of a given position (if it was activated, it is now deactivated and vicecersa).
        Parameters:
        i - int number of entry to change

      • set

        public void set(int i)
        Activates the value of a given position.
        Parameters:
        i - int number of entry to active

      • reset

        public void reset(int i)
        Deactivates the value of a given position.
        Parameters:
        i - int number of entry to deactive

      • set

        public void set(int i,
                boolean value)
        Sets the states (activated or deactivated) of a given position.
        Parameters:
        i - int number of entry to set
        value - boolean new value for the entry

      • complement

        public Mask complement()
        Returns a complementary mask of this mask (the activated entries of this mask are deactivated and viceversa).
        Returns:
        a complementary mask of this mask.

      • and

        public Mask and(Mask m)
        Returns the mask that it's the outcome of the bolean operation 'and' between this and a given mask.
        Parameters:
        m - Mask the other mask
        Returns:
        (this & m)

      • or

        public Mask or(Mask m)
        Returns the mask that it's the outcome of the bolean operation 'or' between this and a given mask.
        Parameters:
        m - Mask the other mask
        Returns:
        (this | m)

      • getnActive

        public int getnActive()
        Return the number of active entries
        Returns:
        the number of active entries

      • next

        public boolean next()
        Advances the cursor to the next active entry. If the cursor reach the end of the mask, it returns false.
        Returns:
        false if the cursor has reached the end of the mask.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Returns the position pointed by the cursors.
        Returns:
        the position pointed by the cursors.

      • resetIndex

        public void resetIndex()
        Sets the cursor at atBegin (that's a non valid position and it will be necessary a next() to reach the first active position).

      • split

        public Mask[] split(double pct,
                    Randomize rand)
        Splits, at random, this mask in two new masks
        Parameters:
        pct - double spliting ratio, the length of the first outcome mask will be pct*|this|
        rand - Randomize random number generator
        Returns:
        two masks ([0] || [1] = this) (the [0] has a length: (pct*|this|).
